models.setupState: Tracks the current progress through the setup wizard, including which step the user is on and whether each step has been completed.
models.databaseConfig: The database integration configuration being set up in step 1. This is required for the application to function.
models.identityProviderConfig: The identity provider integration configuration being set up in step 2. This step is optional and can be skipped.
models.analyticsConfig: The analytics integration configuration being set up in step 3. This step is optional and can be skipped.
models.setupSummary: A summary of all configured integrations shown in the final review step before completing setup.

relationships: SetupState tracks progress through the wizard steps
Each integration config (database, identity provider, analytics) is configured independently
SetupSummary aggregates all configured integrations for final review
Database configuration is required before setup can be completed
